111.content:
The sun peaked over the window sill, illuminating Mario's quaint and cozy bedroom with early morning light. Outside was the sound of birds chirping and Yoshis playing.

In the small wooden hut nestled in the woods, with the large "Mario" sign hanging over the door, it's two occupants were slowly waking. Mario, the short Italian plumber with blue eyes and chocolate colored hair, and Peach, the lovely princess of the Mushroom Kingdom. They were sharing a bed, cuddled up to each other nice and close, dressed in only their underwear. Luigi had traveled to Sarasaland to visit Daisy, so they had the whole place to themselves.

"...heh - hahahahah, s-stop tickling me princess!" Mario suddenly protested, the calm ambiance broken by a sudden giggle fit. Peach smiled mischievously, under the covers her delicate hands carefully played with and prodded Mario's most sensitive areas, namely his cute tum. With both hands she explored Mario's body, pinching at his small love handles and rubbing at his chest and soft belly with her palm.

"I see someone's woken up in a good mood today, eh?" Mario pointed out, a slight smugness creeping into his voice. Mario was always happy to be the center of attention, especially if it was from beautiful ladies. "Mmmm, Mario I'm in a great mood. Just you and me, no Toads, no Bowser, no responsibility... and after last night... how could anybody wake up in a bad mood." Peach responded, and Mario let out a chuckle, which turned into a gasp as the princess' fingers got a little more frisky and her pinky finger hooked into his red underwear, giving it a snap.

Peach leaned in, giving Mario a tender kiss on the cheek, then collapsing on top of him and pushing Mario back into the mattress. "A-ah, Princess? Didn't we have other plans this morning? Mama Mia!" Mario hesitantly reminded his lover, though he made no move to escape her embrace. The lucky man was a good deal shorter than the Princess, so presently with her on top of him like this he had his large nose wedged betwixt her amble bosom. Peach paid no heed to Mario's words and went back to caressing his pudgy frame, tracing a finger up his treasure trail and into his belly button, giving it a curious poke to see how deep her finger would go. Her other hand grabbed a handful of Mario's soft little tush, afterwards giving it a satisfying slap.

Mario blushed, always slightly embarrassed about being teased over his weight. It didn't help that he was almost sure he was a bit more paunchy than usual, the lull in kidnapping activity meant he'd gotten less exercise lately. Plus, being around Peach so often was taking a toll on his figure, it seemed like she always had a fresh baked cake or pie ready for him to consume. She'd invite him over for massive dinners at the castle and make him take home far too much leftovers. She was practically always fostering food onto him, and Mario couldn't understand why she didn't realize it was making her squeeze... more squishy.

It didn't even stop in bed, lately Peach had developed a nasty habit of bringing food into their love making. It was rather awkward the first time she had him cuffed to the bed posts and suddenly produced a large cake from seemingly thin air. But there was no arguing with her in bed, she was incredibly dominant, so he ate every slice that the princess hand fed him. She said it was food-play, to spice up their love life, and granted it made for some of the most amazing sex the couple had ever had, but it was still weird to feel bloated after lovemaking.

At least whenever Mario worried to himself about his weight, he knew he could easily work off these excess pounds the next time he went on an adventure. And at least Peach still seemed attracted to his body, in fact it almost seemed like she was more amorous than usual, what a weird coincidence.

By now Peach had discarded her frilly brassiere and was gently fondling herself, if Peach had gained any weight over the last few months it had gone straight to her breasts which were large and curvacious and bounced slightly anytime she did something active.

Mario groaned, feeling his member stir in his now too tight briefs. For a short guy Mario was packing, like really packing. His over-sized salami and meatballs looked practically out of place on his tubby body, not that Peach was complaining.

With a little difficulty he shimmied out of his underwear and grabbed a-hold of the princess' hips, his turgid member springing up skyward, the smell of arousal was in the air as the two drank each other in with their eyes.

Suddenly, Peach reached over to the dresser-draws beside the bed. Mario was confused for a moment, until he saw what she was retrieving, a box of donuts. Had she hidden them there the entire time? Was this her plan all along?! Mario had no time to think it over because already Peach was pulling out a large pastry with pink frosting and sprinkles, waving it enticingly at the plumber.

Mario loved food, but sweet stuff wasn't exactly his favorite food group, he liked savory, meaty, salty and fatty things most. It looked like there was at least a dozen full sized donuts in the container, one of every flavor. The prospect of eating all that before breakfast wasn't very enticing, but from past experience he knew by the end of this he'd have finished the whole box. The princess would reward him for every bit he consumed, so without complaint he opened his mouth for her to put it in.

"Ahh, good boy, my little hero is learning." Peach complimented, and without hesitation shoved the sugar laden treat into Mario's maw, a bit too forceful for Mario's liking as he struggled to swallow it down, getting icing on his cheeks and a few sprinkles in his carefully maintained mustache. But before he could complain Peach was already reaching for another, chocolate this time, and Mario just had time to catch his breath.

This continued for a while, mixed in-between with heated moments of hip grinding, neck kissing, belly rubbing and lip licking. The room was hot and muggy by the time the ordeal was over, the two laying next to each other both thoroughly spent. They were both red faced and breathing heavily, though Mario was a bit worse for wear, having to also contend with his distended stuffed stomach, which rose like a small taut dome over his midsection. He had to have consumed enough calories in that session to add a few more pounds to his already overweight gut, but thoughts like that were the furthest thing from his mind as he just laid right there with his partner, fully contented.

They stayed there for about half an hour until Peach suddenly sat up in bed, something on her mind.
111.title: Good sleep

1111.content:
"Sweetie," Peach's sugary voice pierced the silence.
"Yes?" Asked Mario as he struggled to sit up with the new pounds covering him.
"I actually need to be somewhere soon, so I've got to go." Peach's voice sounded weird, almost as if a laugh was embedded deep within the words. Mario looked her directly in the face and noticed that her eyes seemed to reflect that laugh back at him. It hit Mario what it was about. She was going to bring back even more food. Mario did like the electric feeling that the food brought to their sex, but for him enough was enough. He just couldn't handle it anymore.
"No." Mario said firmly, but almost regretted it afterwards when he saw the look of hurt on Peach's face. However, he was committed at this point and he couldn't stop now. "Peach," Mario began somewhat timidly, voice wobbling sightly, but gaining strength as he began to speak more. "It needs to stop. I know that you know what I'm talking about, and I'm just going to day that I'm tired of it. This is starting to get unhealthy and we need to stop." Mario finished speaking and saw the hurt in her eyes, but knew he had done the right thing. Little did Mario notice, was the burning fire of revenge behind Peach's eyes. She was going to get her tubby plumber one way or another.
"I'm sorry Mario," her ice blue eyes softening "I shouldn't of acted this way towards you. I think maybe it would be best if we took a short break from each other. Not breaking up, but a short time to ourselves." Peach then got out of the bed and started dressing again, her beautiful pink dress sparking in the early morning sun that shone brightly through a small chink in the window blinds.
Mario salivated slightly at his girl friend's form, but he knew that the break was for the best. Mario got dressed too, his now even more round belly protruding far enough to where he couldn't button his overalls. Mario didn't care and gently showed Peach to the door and said a polite goodbye. As Peach left, she couldn't help but let out a small smirk at her plans for Mario. She was going to get her rotund boyfriend that she wanted.
XxX
About a half a month had passed since the start of the break and Mario wasted no time getting his body back to its previous state and replaced his boxers with elastic ones, so to measure his progress in a way. It wasn't long before he had achieved getting his body back and he rejoiced. Luigi was still gone with Daisy and the stay was prolonged due to a ghost incident that it only took one man to handle (but that's a story for another time).
Mario woke up to the doorbell. Something told him it was Peach, and his suspicions were confirmed when he opened the front door to her standing there, holding what seemed like a small Tupperware container filled with a mysterious green substance. "Hey, I'd like you to know again that I'm sorry, so here is some salad to help you with the weight loss. Peach almost shoved the container into Mario's hands and left hastily with a "I need to take care of something!" shouted over her shoulder. Mario stared at the container in his hands and opened it up and examined it. It was indeed salad without a trace of sweets in sight. Mario looked up, happy, and marched into the kitchen and brought out a fork and started to eat. It was delicious! Mario continued to eat the salad, not noticing Peach peering into the window undetected, excited to see the fruits of her labour.

Peach had done it! She created the perfect trap for Mario by combing her cooking and science knowledge. Sure it took longer than she wanted to in order to create it, but she felt satisfied. She had created the perfect salad; her kind of salad! After fusing a p-balloon and super mushroom together, she created a salad that would cause massive weight gain in the person who eats it. Peach couldn't wait to see what happens when Mario eats it and couldn't restrain herself from peaking in on her boyfriend finishing the salad.

Mario finished what he had considered the best salad he had ever tasted. If this was Peach's new trend of bringing health food that tasted good into bed, he could get behind that. Mario looked down at his now flatter stomach, patting it and happy that Peach was respecting his wishes. Mario continued sitting on the stool in his kitchen, savoring the nice after taste of the salad, when Mario got a weird feeling in his gut. It felt as if he was slowly getting fuller, even though he had already finished the salad. Mario looked down at his gut, finding it looking normal to his relief, and he got up, just as a tingling sensation began in his stomach. Mario's hand was still on his belly when he felt the most curious sensation as if his gut was getting bigger. Mario shrugged this off and walked off to the TV to see what was on. The tingling sensation suddenly got stronger, making Mario stop in his tracks and looked down. To his horror he noticed his gut was in fact larger! Mario stared at this new growth and noticed it was still growing. Mario stared at his now swelling belly, at a loss of what to do, unsure of if it was even real. A sudden pop inside Mario's body shifted him back into reality. He had spaced long enough to give his gut time to grow even larger, to where it popped out a good one solid foot in front of him, setting off his balance somewhat, while his gut continued to grow larger. Mario gave his belly a tentative poke, finding the growth soft and squishy like fat. Mario had to do something fast and he started walking, his swelling belly making it hard to move as it got even bigger. Two loud pings interrupted Mario's walk as he found his belly had gotten so big that his overalls couldn't take the pressure. Mario slowly made his way to his room, his gut now drooping over his upper legs and hanging out of his red shirt. Mario quickly sat on his bed, not sure what good that would do, and looked at his ever expanding tummy. He was scared and unsure why this was happening to him. The tingling feeling got stronger once more and his belly growth got faster, Mario feeling fuller and fuller as his gut continued to bloat up like a balloon. A ripping noise rang out through the tiny house as Mario's shirt hit it's capacity limit and started to rip as his belly pushed it out further. His gut protruded a good 5 feet in front of him, touching the floor and hiding his legs effectively from view, when all of a sudden, the tingling stopped and his gut seemed to have stop swelling. Mario stared down at his mysterious massive belly in terror, unsure of what to do, when suddenly the tingling feeling began in his upper torso and arms. Mario watched on in horror as his chest started to puff up with fat to try and aspire to be like his ridiculously large belly. Mario tried to feel the chest area when he noticed that he could barely move his arms at all. Mario looked to his sides and saw his arms slowly inflating from the fat to where they were stuck sticking out to the sides. Upon closer inspection, Mario realized that his arms were being absorbed into his now bloated and almost spherical body. The tingling feeling then began on Mario's face and he saw his cheeks puff out and felt it harder to move his head. Then the tingling feeling began in Mario's legs as they started to slowly puff up. It wasn't long before a loud rip was heard and what remained of his overalls fell off. Mario tried to get up so he could find a mirror, but as he plopped down to the floor, his legs never touched the ground. His legs had been absorbed too! Mario's nether regions had inflated enough to where only they touched the floor, leaving Mario to awkwardly crotch waddle over to the nearby full body mirror to look at himself, fat jiggling profusely as he went. Mario was almost completely spherical and his elastic underwear and shoes and socks and gloves being all that covered him. Suddenly his entire body tingled more and underwent one final growth. Mario watched as his viewpoint got slightly higher due to his nether regions expanding more. Mario watched on in a strange fascination as his body first absorbed his feet, popping his shoes and socks off and tiny little stubs of toes sticking out of his spherical body, being the only thing that remained of his feet. Next went his hands, slipping off his gloves as his hands and palms were absorbed, leaving only nubs sticking out as fingers, much like his toes. Mario expanded slightly more, his fingers toes and head making indents in his body as they refused to be completely absorbed. All at once, the tingling stopped, leaving the now impossibly fat Mario, sitting there (as if that's the proper expression), unsure of what to do with all that just happened to him. All of a sudden, Peach came in, clearly impressed and happy with how Mario looked and she was carrying......

112131.content:
Luigi shivered. The full moon cast long shadows across the hall, deepening the darkness around the next corner. Really, all he wanted to do was find a guest room and get some sleep. His brother had been making so much noise with the Princess in the next room, he was forced to find a quieter corner of the castle. What were they doing in there that was so loud? Mario had mentioned something about cake before blushing as brightly as the cap on his head. He decided he didn't really want to know anyway if Mario was so embarrassed about it.

         A faint ethereal cry froze Luigi mid-step. Something was hiding around the corner. Or maybe it was nothing. He listened closely, steadying his quickening breaths. No, the sound seemed less like a cackle and more like a sob. Straining his neck, he tiptoed nearly to the corner and just barely caught sight of a small, trembling boo. He broke out in a cold sweat. Nope, he wash not dealing with any boos tonight! He turned to run, but another tearful whimper tugged at his heart.

Should he:
112131.title: No, he's aware.

1121312.content:
Closing his eyes, he shoved the old fear to the back of his mind. He'd dealt with much scarier things than this before and maybe this boo really was in pain. Setting his face in what he hoped was a determined expression, the stepped around the corner.

         It glowed gently blue, barely illuminating the corner it huddled in. Smokey tears trickled down its face, dissipating before they reached the ground, and its tiny arms covered its black eyes. A loud sob wracked it's small form, startling Luigi enough to yelp and stumble a few steps back. The boo noticed and looked up. Frozen in terror, unable to anything but to return its gaze.

"A-are you my mom?" It asked in a girl's voice. Luigi slowly shook his head.

"Oh..." She looked down, on the verge of tears. " It's just... I've been searching for my mom for as long as I can remember." Ghostly tears began to leak out of her eyes once more.

"Uh, I-Its-a okay." He couldn't stand to see the poor thing cry. "Maybe I can help?"

"I don't know where I am! I was shopping with Mommy and then I was here!" Covering her eyes she shook back and forth vigorously. "I just wanna go home!"

Luigi was filled with a sinking realization. This wasn't just a boo - it was a dead child. Approaching her, he knelt as close as he dared without getting hurt.

He bit his lip, trying to think of the best way to tell her. "Well, I t-think you might be-a looking in the wrong castle. If you keep-a floating up, maybe you will a-find her in heaven?"

"Heaven?" she stopped shaking and met Luigi's gaze with wide eyes. "I'm dead?"

"Yes."

Here mouth twisted, looking conflicted before crying, "No! I can't be dead! Please don't let me be dead!" She rushed up and through him, knocking him onto the floor.

"Noooooooo!" She wailed, flying in all directions. Luigi tried to catch his breath.

"P-please-" he wheezed. She shot down, nearly touching face to face.

"I don't want to die," her hysteria had quickly condensed to angry resolve. "You can't let me die!" She settled on his belly, and he cringed at the jolt of pain.

"Please, I want to be reborn."
1121312.title: Cautiously see why the boo is crying.

121121.content:
The shadows of the castle corridor sunk behind the objects that casted them. A guided source of light traveled down the dark hallway. Tired footsteps followed suit of the light. Repeating one after another until the turn at the end of the corridor to repeat the process anew. A quick yawn floated from Princess Peach's mouth as she continued down the hallway.

Paintings of Peach, Toadsworth, Mario, and Luigi all illuminated and darkened when she walked through. Dressed in her rarely seen peachy pink nightgown, Peach’s pursuit for a late night snack was an uncommon event for the royalty, yet tonight was an exception. Before she had a chance to enjoy a slice of cake right after dinner, Toadsworth interrupted with an impromptu need for her to complete a few royal duties. That Toadsworth. Always such a worry.

Princess Peach rounding the corner and stopped in the kitchen door frame.

Bathed in the moonlight, Peach witness a cilantro herb levitating in the air and landing on a warm, well done steak. She slowly set down the lantern to see two Boos become visible from the surrounding darkness. One gasped and the other stopped in its non-existent tracks. Peach too stood motionless. Quite possibly bewildered by the sight of two ghosts prepared a dinner.

"Don't bring the lantern any closer! Please! We're peaceful!", Peach stopped her advance and looked closer at the spiritual pair. From the looks of it, they didn’t seem to mean any harm. "Just who are you anyways? And why are you in my castle?" Peach asked. The Boos exchanged panicked looks as to indicate which one should start speaking. The one holding the herb cleared his throat. "We enjoy cooking plenty. Day in and Day out its all we really do. Also, it helps set us apart from the other Boos. We don’t like scaring people."

Princess Peach rubbed her smooth chin, “Why the kitchen here? I’m sure there are plenty of kitchens in town.” One Boo shook its head, “We would go elsewhere, but none of the kitchens in the kingdom are as good as this one. This kitchen comes really close to the old one.”

“What happened to the old one?”

“It got destroyed along with Bowser’s castle in his last attempt to capture you.”

Peach folded her arms and tapped her foot, “Are you trying to say Bowser had a better kitchen than mine? Do you really expect me to believe you? I’ve seen it before and wasn’t impressed.” Peach began to raise the lantern again until one of the Boos threw their arms up.

"Please. If you’d have a seat! We'll prove to you that we can cook well."

Despite the cautionary part of her knocking on her common sense, the aroma of whatever delicious morsels they cooked has been tickling her nose for the past few minutes. Peach set the lantern down, took a seat, and grabbed the fork. In front of her presented beautifully on a plate is a 36oz, a line of three bread rolls covered in butter, a large mound of mash potatoes, and a side plate of seven eclairs.

A few moments passed by with Peach doing nothing, but looking at the meal before her, she turned to the Boos who urged her to chow down. “This sure is a lot of food. It would be rude to not finish it all.” She stabbed into the steak and cut herself a sizable piece and popped it into her mouth. Her taste buds picked up the marinated, smoky flavor of the meat. It was chewy, but not too far as to not be savory as well. As soon as she swallowed she went for another cut.

The 36oz steak diminished slowly, but surely with sensible slices taken from it every few seconds. Periodically, she left the steak alone to eat a roll and take apart the mound of mashed potatoes. All of which complimented each other in taste and texture. Only a short amount of time passed before the only thing left on the plate were the juices from the steak. Peach reclined while she lazily bit on the last eclair. The filling drooped onto her lip which she lethargically licked off.

Peach patted her stomach in satisfaction. The meal was as delicious as it was filling, "Simply impressive! You may stay here as long as you like!" The Boos smiled, delighted, flashing their big white fangs, “Thank you so much, Princess! We love that you liked our meal so much.”

With a satisfying meal in her stomach, Princess Peach prepared to get herself to bed as soon as possible. Before she could leave the table…

Bowser laid back with a groan on his throne, scheming away at another greater plan to win over the Mushroom Kingdom and its lovely ruler. Head resting in his clawed hand, he grumbled as he remembered the two reasons his plans always seem to fail, the red annoying plumber fouling up his works and his green stache brother.

Mario and Luigi.

"Those pesky plumbers!", he snarled. "They make me... AARRRGGHHH!" Fire escaping out from his mouth, causing some of his underlings to get nervous and frightened while standing nearby from with great frustration.

"Every time I try to grab Peach, they get in my way! What do they even get for it? Cake? Pecks on the cheek? She's got that sort of refined charm going on, but... Argh! If only there was some way to get them to stop being so... Persistent..."

While the Koopa King continued to mull thoughts over in his head, Kammy, his high-ranking member of the Koopa Troop and right-hand woman, entered the throne room while floating in with her broomstick; crackling away at something...

"What's got you into a laughing fit?" Bowser asked, his thoughts interrupted by Kammy's sudden laughing appearance.

"I think I have the perfect solution!" Kammy replied back slyly.

"Perfect solution to what?"

"To what you've been blabbering about for the last hour, honestly, the entire castle could hear your groans of despair!" She snapped. "I'll make the princess so grotesque to those plumbers, they'll be RELIEVED when you show up to take her away!"

"Really? You think that would work?" Bowser said, intrigued by this crazy idea. "I've always thought she'd be cuter if she was a bit heavier anyway, and loosened up some... But... "

Scratching his chin with her clawed fingers, "How do you suppose we do that...?"

"Nyeah heh heh heh! We have to be sneaky about it. Can't have them figuring we're behind it, or they'll try fixing her first... How should I go about this...?"

12121211.content:
Princess Toadstool had always been revered by her people, not only for her expertise in running the Mushroom Kingdom, but also her very princess-like figure. Nobody, not even the princess herself, knew how she maintained such a svelte hourglass shape, with an almost miniature waist, large yet perky DD cup breasts and a proportionate rear end to accompany them. Although, again, nobody had the foggiest clue of how she kept such a perfect body, Peach figured that whatever she was doing was working, and right now the objective was a midnight snack.

As the princess made her way through her castle’s halls, the high ceilings of which causing each step of her pink slippers to reverberate distantly yet quietly down the dark walkway, illuminated only by a faint full moon shrouded by storm clouds and the candlelight surrounding the pajama-clad princess. The quiet pitter patter of the rain on the grand windows nearly lulled the princess back to sleep as she made her way to her royal kitchen.

The princess was well acquainted with this kitchen, not due to any sort of cooking experience, no that’s what servants are for, but more specifically she was well acquainted with the gargantuan walk-in freezer that may as well have been called a sub-zero warehouse. Her midnight snacking was practically a nightly tradition at this point and this massive repository of almost cryogenically preserved food was the perfect place to grab a bite of virtually anything her royal heart desires, that is so long as she was willing to wait for it to thaw.

Peach selected a quaint vine of grapes from the fruit section of the well organized food library, running on some kind of culinary equivalent of the Dewey Decimal System. This selection however was not a carefully calculated one, rather a somewhat hasty decision. There was a certain chill in the air of the kitchen, and not just that of the absurdly low temperatures emanating from the still open freezer door, no this was an almost ghastly chill. The kitchen was further inward than the hall she traveled through to get to it, and as such the sprawling tiled floor covered in cooking station after cooking station, designed for maximum efficiency to get out as much food as needed for large-scale banquets, may as well have not been there at all, as the whole room was consumed by darkness, save for the pale moonlit doorway Peach entered through and the dim orange light of her candle.

As the sleepy Princess watched and waited for the candle-warmed bundle of ice cubes she hoped would be grapes after some thorough melting, she heard what sounded like the clanging of metal across the absurdly long room, coming from the dark abyss barely staved off by her candle. Too frightened to even turn and look, she focused on the almost unchanged over-frozen grapes.

A few moments passed in shocked silence as Peach braced for assassination, or something equally terrible. Before long she heard more clattering, and movement in the freezer. The princess could only imagine what horrific creature was making so many sounds. Regaining the ability to move out of sheerly fight or flight responses, Peach made a break for the exit to the kitchen, candle in hand. Just as she reached the square of light casted through the doorway by the moon, the door slammed itself shut. Peach was stuck, stuck with whatever horrible being wanted to keep her there. With nothing left to lose, the princess opened her eyes and turned around, only to find her suspicions had been incorrect. The kitchen was not occupied by an eldritch horror, rather it was buzzing with at least 200 Boos, having a joyous romp with the pots and pans.

A relieved yet still slightly traumatized Peach managed to stop quivering in the corner and watched the Boos toss various meats and spices to one another, boil water using nothing but ectoplasmic energy, and generally make a chaotic mess of things, while still somehow looking organized in the chaos. In truth, the Boos’ choice to make themselves visible filled the room with a pleasant blue glow, illuminating almost every square inch, albeit a bit dimly.

After about a minute of watching the parade of specters, things seemed to turn south. First one Boo spotted the princess, and of course they told their friend, and so on until at least 50 of them all came together into a much more threatening and much larger version of themselves, cornering the princess while the rest continued cooking. The Big Boo spoke in a surprisingly smooth accent, “Ahh, mistress Toadstool! How pleasant that you’re already here! We were worried we may have had to awaken you ourselves, and at such a late hour.” The large spirit knew that it meant no harm... at least not yet, but as if by nature, it’s voice had a hint of an ominous tone. The princess was at a loss for words, however the Boo carried on as if she had responded with the exact words it had expected. “Well, it’s not proper for the receiver of such a glorious feast as the one we are preparing to have to sit and watch the cooks! Please, let my companion escort you to the dining hall. Entertainment awaits!” Peach’s brief confusion was immediately answered by the hypothetical “companion” creating itself simply by splitting from the larger ghost.

The Boo was only half as big as the previous yet still far larger than anything Peach could hope to fight, so still somewhat shocked, the princess somewhat absentmindedly allowed the spectral escort to lead her to the dining hall, as if the princess was in the Boos’ castle now.

Once Peach entered the dining hall, the thought popped into her head that maybe she was in the Boos’ castle. As she was seated, her own castle looked unfamiliar. Her usually bright chandelier was lit by a couple of dim Peepas stuffed into the lanterns, which illuminated the room surprisingly well. The dinnerware was all hovering around the room with a glowing aura and the “entertainment” that was promised was a bunch of haunted instruments shooting through the air playing some sort of off-key concerto. Despite the ghastly nature of it all, Peach actually found it quite pleasant.

After a couple of distorted songs, a chorus of screechy voices erupted from the kitchen, “Dinner is served!” Just after those three fateful words, hoards of Boos came flying through the back wall dozens at a time, each one carrying at least 5, most of them holding upwards of 7, platters chock full of all sorts of delightful meals. Suddenly Peach remembered what got her swept up in this in the first place, a midnight snack. It had been delayed so much that she was ready to scarf down just about anything, and an expertly cooked smorgasbord was more than enough to fill that criteria.

Once every last platter had been delivered to the gargantuan table, meant for over 100 people, the whole thing was covered 10 layers high with food. All at once, the Boos howled, “Eat up!” similarly to their previous ghastly choir. Immediately, Peach grabbed whatever was at eye level, in this case, a massive roasted turkey. She shoveled meal after meal into her face, without concern for her figure, little did she know that she would be quite happy with the distribution of all those calories anyways. As she ate, each bite seemed to plump her breasts, and strangely not the rest of her body, more and more.

Upon contact, Ludwig vanished completely, leaving Wendy confused.

"Ludwig? Where did you go?"

She couldn't fathom where that blue-haired egghead went, so she left the library in a huff. Outside the entrance, two Troopas stood guard, noticing their pink-bowed higher-up leaving. She looked with authority at one.

"You two didn't see where Ludwig went, did you?"

"Uh, no. We didn't see him leave."

"Oh, of course you didn't!" Wendy's angry hand swung down onto the guard's head, followed by his disappearance. The other guard witnessed this, as well as Wendy's increased bigness, making him shake in his armour. Wendy, however, was left confused.

"Why is everyone disappearing all of a sudden!" She looks to the now-lone guard's shaking. "What are you scared of!...Hey...weren't you taller?"

Just then, Wendy noticed something felt off, like she was rounder or something. She looked down at herself, seeing a round orange ball where her body was. Wendy, seeing her belly poke out further than normal, was filled with shock. Within seconds of wondering how it could've happened, she remembered the spell that Ludwig cast, realizing what it actually meant to 'become part of your greatness'.

"HOHOHOHOHOHOHOHO! This is the greatest thing that's ever happened to me!" Wendy was filled with giddiness--twirling in in place, clasping her hands. Her giggles rang through the halls with a great echo.

Upon an ubrupt stop she stopped her laughing dance, and looked to the remaining guard with dark intent. The guard became the hardest shaker that ever existed, with buckets of sweat pouring down his face. Wendy approached him while extending her finger to him, making him lean away to shake and sweat harder than ever. Her claw grazed his beak, absorbing him into the very point. The guard struggled to escape but his entirety was soon sucked through her claw, into the young lady's already increased bulk.

As her body took in the mass, Wendy hugged her belly with pride and giggled a bit more.
